revised_title: Chinese Natural Resources and Exports: A Letter from Father D'Incarville
tldr: Father D'Incarville, a Jesuit in Peking, describes various Chinese natural resources and exports, including the varnish tree, paper production, white wax, tallow candles, and silk production. He also discusses the production of dyes, oils, and other materials, as well as the challenges of obtaining accurate information about these resources due to political restrictions.
